title: Max's Choice
description: Will He Choose Me or Her?ME: Kitchen maid who smells like bleach.THE DUCHESS: Gorgeous noblewoman who bathes in champagne.ME: Max's soulmate.THE DUCHESS: Max's fianc√©e.ME: Ready to do whatever it takes to show him how I feel.THE DUCHESS: Already doing exactly that.ME: Gulp.
